root.name: Kabobber
root.description: Originally developed in 1983 for the Atari 2600, the game never saw release until 2001 when it was released in ROM form after being rediscovered in 2000. The game was finally commercially released (albeit still unfinished) as part of the 2002 Activision Anthology collection for PS2 and GBA, then later as a $3 download for Microsoft's Game Room.
